modName: Blush Complexion for the Shy Ones
summary: Adds a blush complexion for non-beast races.
descriptionHtml:
"Ah, here's the blushing bride now. Let's begin the ceremony." [i]-Maramal, priest of the Temple of Mara[/i]

If there's something the face generator is missing, it would be blush textures. So I threw together this simple mod. I won't have much use of it myself, period.

Consider this plugin a modders resource as in that you can add this complexion to NPC's as well as making patches for custom races. I've also uploaded a PSD-resource for you lot to increase the saturation among other things.

I would recommend mods that enhance the look of female and male faces.

Tools used:
Gimp (with dds plugin)
Creation Kit
Wrye Bash

User screenshots are always welcome! ^^
author: T3alrose
